vision.notes: Vision capabilities are unknown based on the provided context. Further research is needed.

chemoreception.notes: Likely relies on chemoreception for navigation and prey detection, common in burrowing amphibians. Further research is needed to identify which modalities are used.

mechanoreception.notes: Likely relies on mechanoreception/touch for navigation and prey detection, common in burrowing amphibians. Further research is needed to identify which modalities are used.

hearing.notes: Stapes are imperforated suggesting reduced airborne sound detection but potential for substrate vibration detection exists.
